title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Implemented ensemble learning models (RandomForest, XGBoost, VotingClassifier, MLP) to identify fraudulent transactions. Achieved AUC-PR of 0.88 with RandomForest, which translates to a significant improvement in fraud detection rate.

title: Hand-written digits Prediction
description: Built a K-Means clustering model with t-SNE visualization, achieving an accuracy of 0.86. Analyzed high-dimensional digit features and reduced them by 99% using PCA & t-SNE techniques.

title: Survey-form Web Application
description: Deployed a microservices-based survey application using CI/CD pipeline (Jenkins & Docker) on AWS EC2. Reduced deployment time by 50%, enabling rapid and reliable updates to the AWS EC2-hosted application. Implemented Kubernetes Load Balancer to distribute traffic across 3 pods, boosting availability to 99.9%.
